package.name: meshproc
package.description: A few ROS nodes for constructive solid geometry queries on meshes and point set -> mesh conversion. Includes a redistribution of the TriMesh2 lib (just the lib files!), used here for mesh I/O. Includes a redistribution of libkdtree++ (just the hpp files!) for vertex near-neighbors queries.
package.author: Mihai Pomarlan
